channel.title: How to get an offline, no internet needed server created?
channel.description: so prettymuch a standalone game. just rsc by urself, all alone, thats all i want. . heres why. i want it on a usb or something for years to come, its the only game for the computer i play. so there :cool: Thanks!

item.title: How to get an offline, no internet needed server created?
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

P.S- What kind of name is “Slaveofmen” its not making us believe you are hetero.

i was most likely drunk when i signed up :palm:

anyways, lol

item.title: How to get an offline, no internet needed server created?
item.dc:creator: @MrFamous MrFamous
item.description:
@MrFamous wrote:

You need EasyRSC or NOOBScape source. Like the name says it’s pretty easy to config server to run offline and you don’t need internet connection to play. If need help with that PM me and ask for my Skype.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get an offline, no internet needed server created?

item.title: How to get an offline, no internet needed server created?
item.dc:creator: @Aleka Aleka
item.description:
@Aleka wrote:

slaveofmen:

so prettymuch a standalone game. just rsc by urself, all alone, thats all i want. . heres why. i want it on a usb or something for years to come, its the only game for the computer i play. so there Thanks!

Yeah easyrsc seems like your best option. However if you have it on a usb make sure to configure the computer correctly when uploading it.

P.S- What kind of name is “Slaveofmen” its not making us believe you are hetero.

Read full topic
